summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on an urban road. Initially, the road is clear with a few vehicles ahead. As the vehicle progresses, a black car on the right side overtakes the self-driving vehicle. Later, a white sedan appears directly in front of the self-driving vehicle, moving at a slower speed.
actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains a consistent speed initially. As the black car overtakes from the right side, the vehicle continues to drive steadily. Upon encountering the white sedan directly ahead, the self-driving vehicle decelerates to maintain a safe distance.
key_objects: 1) Right side: A black car, approximately 5 meters away, overtaking the self-driving vehicle. 2) Front: A white sedan, approximately 10 meters away, moving at a slower speed, causing the self-driving vehicle to decelerate.

summary: In this segment, the self-driving vehicle is traveling on an urban road. There are multiple vehicles ahead, and a cyclist is visible on the right side of the road. The road is relatively clear, with moderate traffic.
actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains a consistent speed and lane position. The driver is likely monitoring the vehicles ahead and the cyclist on the right side to ensure safe driving.
key_objects: 1) Front: Multiple vehicles, approximately 20-30 meters away, moving in the same direction. 2) Right: A cyclist, approximately 10 meters away, moving parallel to the self-driving vehicle.
